<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hexagonisd/#ab37bf6c49bc26c43ddd958218f63ba00a662d9d1c3bdd6545232f81a3eaeceae5"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hexagonisd/#ab37bf6c49bc26c43ddd958218f63ba00a662d9d1c3bdd6545232f81a3eaeceae5">TL&#95;TRUNCATE</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from auto-folding operations, e.g.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (i32 ext (i16 ext i8)) would be folded to (i32 ext i8).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To simplify the type legalization, we want to keep these</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// single steps separate during type legalization.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TL&#95;&#91;EXTEND|TRUNCATE&#93; Inp, i128 &#95;, i32 Opc</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; Inp is the original input to extend/truncate,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; &#95; is a dummy operand with an illegal type (can be undef),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; Opc is the original opcode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The legalization process (in Hexagon lowering code) will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// first deal with the &quot;real&quot; types (i.e. Inp and the result),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and once all of them are processed, the wrapper node will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be replaced with the original ISD node. The dummy illegal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operand is there to make sure that the legalization hooks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are called again after everything else is legal, giving</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">               </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// us the opportunity to undo the wrapping.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hexagonisd/#ab37bf6c49bc26c43ddd958218f63ba00abc78d6c7742c7d8ccc67946b78f2ba68"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hexagonisd/#ab37bf6c49bc26c43ddd958218f63ba00abc78d6c7742c7d8ccc67946b78f2ba68">TYPECAST</a>,    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No-op that&#39;s used to convert between different legal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
